original_title: Child’s body with wounds found at construction site
original_body_lines: The body of a five-and-a-half-year-old child was found with injuries suspected to have been caused by broken glass bottles, was found in front of a construction site Halbarawa in Mulleriyawa, police said.
They said the body was found yesterday afternoon (08) during an investigation conducted by the Mulleriyawa Police based on information received through the 119 emergency number.

The child is from the Halbarawa area of Malabe. Police investigations have revealed that the child was under the care of the grandmother and grandfather, as her father lives separately and the mother leaves for work during the day.
Police said the magisterial inquiry and the forensic officer's on-site investigations have been completed.
The body has been sent to the National Institute of Infectious Diseases for a post-mortem examination, police said.
